mapper.select: SELECT from collection WHERE user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND be_collectioned_id = #{be_collectioned_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT FROM collection WHERE user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND collection_type = 1
mapper.insert: insert into collection (collection_id, user_id, be_collectioned_id, collection_type) values (#{collectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beCollectionedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectionType,jdbcType=INTEGER})
